Properties.Description: None Data Source for Pipeline functions
Properties.Name: NONE_DS

Fn::Join: Lambda function for auto-deleting objects in

DynamoDBModelTableReadIOPS.Description: The number of read IOPS the table should support.

DynamoDBModelTableWriteIOPS.Description: The number of write IOPS the table should support.

DynamoDBBillingMode.Description: Configure @model types to create DynamoDB tables with PAY_PER_REQUEST or PROVISIONED billing modes.

DynamoDBEnablePointInTimeRecovery.Description: Whether to enable Point in Time Recovery on the table.

DynamoDBEnableServerSideEncryption.Description: Enable server side encryption powered by KMS.
